name: The endpoint /posts with specific ID returns the post with same ID when GET method is used

testSteps.description:
The endpoint /posts with specific ID returns the post with same ID when GET method is used #1: {ID=1, StatusCode=200, Title=sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit, Body=quia et suscipit
suscipit recusandae consequuntur expedita et cum
reprehenderit molestiae ut ut quas totam
nostrum rerum est autem sunt rem eveniet architecto}
